name: punny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving puns (= humorous uses of words or phrases that have several meanings or that sound like another word) : The show features characters with punny names such as Placido Flamingo and Meryl Sheep. The plots of his novels are elaborate, the language dense and punny.
More examplesFewer examplesThe band has always had a penchant for odd, punny song titles.I am often wary of restaurants with punny names."I'm taking the parrot to the vet for some tweetment," was his punny remark as he walked out of the door with the cage.
